thread.title: Unfair charges for a booking I did not finalize
thread.title_full: Unfair charges for a booking I did not finalize - Review of La Quinta Inn & Suites Manhattan, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Abdullah A
title: Unfair charges for a booking I did not finalize
text: I booked a room for a few nights by calling the reservation center. The agent took my credit card number and said there won't be charges until you finalize the booking from your email. I did not finalize it and I was surprised there is a charge of $1xx.xx and when I called them. They won't refund my money back. Be careful from these cheaters!
